name: Top Down Shooter (QxterStudio)
description:
BUTTONS:

Space - Noclip

WASD - Movement

R - Restart

esc - exit

Music - Lost Spider Purplis Sandbox

Game:

living squares are called - Kaled

bullets have a chance to go through walls

the player cannot pass through a 1-square passage

hostile Kaleds are dumb

the player looks at the cursor

Versions:

0.0.2 - new level, destroy bullets
